title: Dr. William Li's Immunity Boosters for Fall
description:
Dr. William Li, physician, scientist and author of the NY Times best seller Eat To Beat Disease: The New Science of How Your Body Can Heal Itself is back to talk about how we can safely reopen schools, the timing of potential vaccines, and the amazing benefits of seasonal foods. 

Guest Links:

Dr.WilliamLi.com

Instagram: @DrWilliamLi


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy


This Week’s Sponsors:

SEED.com/Jillian, or promo code Jillian for 15% off your 1st month of Daily Synbiotic
